channel.title: blender on jmbuhr.de
channel.description: Recent content in blender on jmbuhr.de

item.title: Blender3d School Open Movie
item.description: At the end of the Summer 2019 we got together as a group that met at the blender3d Summer School, a yearly event with blender workshops, to produce a short movie within 2 weeks. This is the result: You can learn more about it on the project website. I was very lucky to work with such talented and inspirational people and am proud of what we achieved in such a small amount of time.
